name: @microservices-suite/notification-service
description: The notification service delivers timely and relevant notifications to users and other services within our microservices ecosystem. It supports various communication channels, including email, SMS, push notifications, and in-app messages, allowing flexible and personalized engagement with our audience. Whether it's transactional alerts, updates on account activities, or marketing campaigns, the notification service ensures reliable delivery and tracking of messages. With configurable templates, scheduling, and audience segmentation, it empowers our platform to deliver targeted and impactful notifications, enhancing user engagement and driving business growth.
author: Gilbert Andanje
